home.introduction: Hi,I’m Sebastian – a career changer with a passion for technology, web development, and information security. I’m currently undergoing comprehensive training in information security management and pursuing certifications as an ISO/IEC 27001 Lead Implementer, Lead Auditor, BSI IT-Grundschutz Practitioner, and in Business Continuity Management (BCM). This portfolio website offers an insight into my background, my projects, and my skill set – both in full-stack web development and in my current focus on IT security management and compliance. My goal is to help organizations protect their information assets and implement data protection and resilience requirements in a structured and effective way. Feel free to explore, learn more about my journey – and don’t hesitate to reach out if you’d like to connect!

about.title: From Wind Turbines to Information security – My Journey
about.description: Hey there! I’m Sebastian – an IT enthusiast, tech nerd at heart, and someone who thrives on challenges. My journey into information security has been anything but linear. I’ve worked in quality assurance, electronics, and IT support – and even studied nautical science for a while (yes, ships!). But one thing has always been true: I’m passionate about technology and problem-solving. Whether it's about designing security concepts, performing risk assessments, preparing audits, or troubleshooting systems – I enjoy diving deep into structures and finding smart solutions. Currently, I’m undergoing intensive training in information security management (ISO/IEC 27001 Lead Implementer & Auditor, BSI IT-Grundschutz Practitioner, BCM), combining both technical know-how and organizational thinking. Outside of IT, I’m a curious and sociable person who enjoys traveling, gaming, sports, and DIY projects. I thrive in collaborative environments, believe in continuous learning, and bring a positive, solution-focused attitude to everything I do. If you're looking for someone motivated, adaptable, and eager to grow – let’s connect!
